name: UComboGraphAbilityTask_StartGraph
doc: This task is meant to be used to start / activate a Combo Graph Asset from within a Gameplay Ability

OnGraphStart: Event invoked when the combat graph is started.
OnGraphEnd: Event invoked when the combat graph ends (usually when a montage completes, meaning no further input registered, thus should end the ability)
EventReceived: Event triggered when a combo graph node is listening for specific tags (either via EventTags or from Cues / Effects Containers) and owning avatar actor is receiving those events

methods.name: GetCurrentNode
methods.doc: Returns the currently active node for the task

methods.name: GetPreviousNode
methods.doc: Returns the node that was active just before the current one
